titles.title: A bill to amend the Commercial Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1986 to provide that the requirements for the operation of commercial motor vehicles will not apply to the operation of certain farm vehicles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 3/14/1988--Introduced. Amends the Commercial Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1986 to declare that its requirements do not apply to motor vehicles registered for farm use which are not driven more than 15,000 miles per year.
